h2_title: Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: Defeating the Tiger Vanguard will award you a Mind Core, and the Keeness of Tiger, the second Key Item needed along with the Sterness of Stone to finally open the big stone doors in this chapter that lead to the final boss. In fact, there’s one of those tallies in this very arena that can open up a secret path!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating the Tiger Vanguard will award you a Mind Core, and the Keeness of Tiger, the second Key Item needed along with the Sterness of Stone to finally open the big stone doors in this chapter that lead to the final boss. In fact, there’s one of those tallies in this very arena that can open up a secret path!
